title: Is Chef unfair, Scolish Stefanic at the hearing?
subtitle: The Republicans clashed with the Chairman of the Intelligence Committee of the United States Council, Adam Schiff, about their interrogation of former Ukrainian Ambassador Mary Jovanovic.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The Chairman of the United States Council Intelligence Committee, Adam Schiff, unfairly refused to allow a member of the Republican Council to ask questions during the isolation investigation.
